F\u00fcr die Installation kann entweder.en-us: Either a virtual machine (VM) or a physical computer (bare metal) can be used for the installation. Both options are suitable and offer the necessary requirements for the installation. In this example, a Proxmox VM is used, but other virtualization platforms can also be used.

Bevor mit der Installation von Caldera D.en-us: Before you can start installing Caldera Dock and Caldera Rip on Ubuntu 22.04, there are some basic steps that should be performed.
